specs.title: Chatrooms Registry
specs.description:
Specify a list of chatrooms, one per line, using the next syntax:

name | description | min level

Examples:

Lobby   | Generic chat     |  10
Authors | Only for authors | 100

You can temporarily disable any room by prepending its line with a #.

specs.title: Show on category indexes
specs.description:
You can show chatroom widgets below the heading on specific category indexes. Specify one per line, using the next syntax:

category slug | chat name

Examples:

uncategorized | Lobby
forums | Shoutbox
admins_only | Valhalla

You can temporarily disable any room from the page by prepending its line with a #.
